title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on New Towns
purpose: To celebrate the UK’s New Towns, identify common challenges and make the case for investment and sustainable growth. This APPG will examine how to best support the needs of the 2.8 million people already living in new towns and consider the needs of the residents of the future. Learning the lessons from past new towns in championing and supporting the creation of more new towns.

contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Jeanette Aves, Town and Country Planning Association. Tel: 020 8132 5459
contact_details.secretariat: Town and Country Planning Association acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.tcpa.org.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Town and Country Planning Association is paid by The Lady Margaret Paterson Osborn Trust to act as the group's secretariat From: 12/11/2024 To: 11/11/2025
